Articles.Content:
So, I got KSP last night and tinkered around with it for a little bit before bed, had some fun, crashed a bit. Great fun! I skipped the tutorial, because I like to just get in and do..

Today I come in and mess a little bit more, getting closer and closer to my goal.. and finally....

I\'m in mission now and have a little bit more fuel, let\'s see if I can get splash down. Going to orbit for a day and give it a go.

Welcome to the forums!

Watch out for Capt\'n Skunky, he\'ll try and post a welcome to the forums message.

Welcome to the forums!

Watch out for Capt\'n Skunky, he\'ll try and post a welcome to the forums message.

Arm yourselves

Mission accomplished!

In all fairness to the learning curve, I flew a lot of the Orbiter Simulator and before the last time I stopped flying that I was working planetary insertions to Mars.

I really like the style of KSP, the idea of building a space program, getting upgraded parts to do more complex missions is AWESOME! Good luck guys, hope to see you on STEAM or whatever digital distribution you go with soon.

Capt\'n Skunky
